title: Shokugeki no Souma: San no Sara - Toutsuki Ressha-hen OVA
alternative_title: Shokugeki no Soma: San no Sara OVA, Food Wars! The Third Plate OVA, Shokugeki no Souma 3rd Season OVA
description: Bundled with the 29th volume of the Shokugeki no Souma manga. It tells the story of what happened to Erina after she ran away from her father.
